name: Chain Reaction (itch) (Unfocused Locust Games)
description:
Meet Dully. He's been doing hard time, but he's still got life left to live. For Dully, there's only one option: escaping prison. But that might be hard, what with the giant ball and chain shackled to his leg.

ARROW KEYS/WASD - Move

SPACE/MOUSE LEFT - Pick up/Throw ball at mouse

Can you explore the metroidvania prison and escape, or will you be chained up for the rest of your life? Find out in Chain Reaction.
